name: Pizscape
description:
Your kingdom is under attack. After a thousand years of imprisonment the Pizs want to take their revenge. As the grand sorcerer of the kingdom, you're the only person who's capable of defending it.

Type the name of the spell then press ENTER to cast it. You can check the spell name in the spell book. If you mistype a spell, you can always use the BACKSPACE to fix your mistakes.

Most importantly, have fun!
